cont.entity_a: Lens has spots that appear in pictures, suggesting an internal issue.
Flash initially had issues but was resolved with cleaning.
Camera body has a good feel and is durable. Solid and sturdy design with a balanced feel. Solid build and great grip.
cont.entity_b: Older model but sturdy and consistent. Solid build, though heavy for some users.

cont.entity_a: Battery life is long, but additional batteries may be needed. Battery life is impressive but battery compartment door is flimsy.
Produces great pictures even after 10 years.
cont.entity_b: 12.8 MP original 5D offers genuine image quality and personality. Excellent image quality, dynamic range, and color. Great image quality with rich colors. Takes beautiful photos with excellent textures and colors.

cont.entity_a: Latency is subsecond, suitable for capturing action shots.
cont.entity_b: Full-frame sensor provides better performance than crop sensors.

cont.entity_a: Does not take video, unlike newer digital cameras.
Advanced control algorithms and technology.
Easy to use, allowing more focus on photography than settings. Great quality camera, easy to use, fun to use.
cont.entity_b: Not the most beginner-friendly, better for those familiar with Canon systems.

cont.entity_a: Low noise performance is above average, ISO1600 is usable.
cont.entity_b: Great for low-light shots with minimal noise.

cont.entity_a: Compatible with a wide range of lenses. No support for 64-bit operating systems.
Kit lens is adequate for general purposes but may need upgrading for specific needs.
Rapid shooting feature is effective for action shots.
Switch placement is awkward but other controls are well-placed.
cont.entity_b: Big viewfinder and consistent output control.

cont.entity_a: Autofocus is fast and accurate.
8 megapixel resolution allows for large prints.
Boot up time is almost instantaneous.
Lacks true spot metering and has a loud mirror slap.
First unit had flash exposure issues, resolved with replacement.
Older model but still highly functional. Impressive feature list at an affordable price.
cont.entity_b: Lacks modern features like Live View and auto ISO.

cont.entity_a: Impressive feature list at an affordable price.
cont.entity_b: Affordable price for a full-frame camera.
Suitable for street photography and studio portraits. Great for landscapes and portraits with flexible bracketing. Good for amateur and professional photographers.
Great addition for photographers wanting to upgrade from crop sensors.
Good functionality with a professional feel. Some users experienced faulty equipment but found solutions.
